blocks.name: tfi
blocks.content: The Principle of Transfinite Induction. Theorem 7.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 39. This principle states that if ` A ` is a class of ordinal numbers with the property that every ordinal number included in ` A ` also belongs to ` A ` , then every ordinal number is in ` A ` . See theorem ~ tfindes or ~ tfinds for the version involving basis and induction hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfi(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, con0), wral(s0, con0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wceq(c0, con0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wss(c0, con0), wral(s0, con0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wceq(c0, con0), wa(wss(c0, con0), wss(con0, c0)))
  anim2i(wss(c0, con0), wral(s0, con0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(con0, c0))
  nsyl2(wral(s0, con0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(con0, c0), wrex(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  sylib(wral(s0, con0, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wn(wrex(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls))), wral(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wn(wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  ralimi2(s0, con0, cdif(con0, c0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wn(wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  ex(wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(con0, c0)), wn(wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  mtod(wa(wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(con0, c0))), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(con0, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eldifn(cv(s0), con0, c0)
  impel(wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(con0, c0)), wi(wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  a2i(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  imim1d(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls))
  syl5com(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls), wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), con0))
  onss(cv(s0))
  difin0ss(con0, c0, cv(s0))
  eldifi(cv(s0), con0, c0)
  ralnex(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls))
  sylbi(wn(wss(con0, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wne(cdif(con0, c0), emptycls))
  necon3bbii(cdif(con0, c0), emptycls, wss(con0, c0))
  ssdif0(con0, c0)
  mp3an12(wne(cdif(con0, c0), emptycls), wrex(s0, cdif(con0, c0), wceq(cin(cdif(con0, c0), cv(s0)), emptycls)), word(con0), wss(cdif(con0, c0), con0))
  ordon()
  difss(con0, c0)
  tz7.5(s0, con0, cdif(con0, c0))
  eqss(c0, con0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, con0, c0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

thm tfi(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ On ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ On,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)))→ c0 = On)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ⊆ On ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ On,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0))), c0 = On, (c0 ⊆ On ∧ On ⊆ c0))
  anim2i(c0 ⊆ On, ∀(s0 ∈ On,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), On ⊆ c0)
  nsyl2(∀(s0 ∈ On,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), On ⊆ c0, ∃(s0 ∈(On \ c0),((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅))
  sylib(∀(s0 ∈ On,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), ¬ ∃(s0 ∈(On \ c0),((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅), ∀(s0 ∈(On \ c0), ¬((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅))
  ralimi2(s0, con0, (On \ c0), (s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0), ¬((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅)
  ex((s0 ∈ On →(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), s0 ∈(On \ c0), ¬((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅)
  mtod(((s0 ∈ On →(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0))∧ s0 ∈(On \ c0)), ((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅, s0 ∈ c0)
  adantl((s0 ∈ On →(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), s0 ∈(On \ c0), ¬ s0 ∈ c0)
  eldifn(s0, con0, c0)
  impel((s0 ∈ On →(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0)), s0 ∈(On \ c0), (((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅ → s0 ∈ c0), s0 ∈ On)
  a2i(s0 ∈ On, (s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ∈ c0), (((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅ → s0 ∈ c0))
  imim1d(s0 ∈ On, s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ∈ c0, ((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅)
  syl5com(s0 ∈ On, ((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅, s0 ⊆ c0, s0 ⊆ On)
  onss(s0)
  difin0ss(con0, c0, s0)
  eldifi(s0, con0, c0)
  ralnex(s0, (On \ c0), ((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅)
  sylbi(¬ On ⊆ c0, ∃(s0 ∈(On \ c0),((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅), (On \ c0)≠ ∅)
  necon3bbii((On \ c0), emptycls, On ⊆ c0)
  ssdif0(con0, c0)
  mp3an12((On \ c0)≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈(On \ c0),((On \ c0)⋂ s0)= ∅), Ord(On), (On \ c0)⊆ On)
  ordon()
  difss(con0, c0)
  tz7.5(s0, con0, (On \ c0))
  eqss(c0, con0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, con0, c0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tfis
blocks.content: Transfinite Induction Schema. If all ordinal numbers less than a given number ` x ` have a property (induction hypothesis), then all ordinal numbers have the property (conclusion). Exercise 25 of [Enderton] p. 200. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfis(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsb(s1, s0, w0)), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0, wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  rabeq2i(s0, con0, con0, w0)
  eqcomi(con0, crab(s0, con0, w0))
  mp2an(wceq(crab(s0, con0, w0), con0), wss(crab(s0, con0, w0), con0), wral(hs0, con0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))))
  ssrab2(s0, con0, w0)
  rgen(hs0, con0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))))
  vtoclgaf(s0, cv(hs0), con0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0)))
  nfim(s0, wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))
  nfss(s0, cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, crab(s0, con0, w0))
  nfrab1(s0, con0, w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0), wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))
  syl5bbr(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))), wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wss(cv(s0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))
  dfss3(s1, cv(s0), crab(s0, con0, w0))
  sseq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))
  syl5bbr(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), w0), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))
  rabid(s0, con0, w0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, crab(s0, con0, w0))
  anc2li(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))), w0)
  syl5(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))), w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wsb(s1, s0, w0)))
  ralimi(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wsb(s1, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  elrab2(hs1, cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0), con0, wsb(s1, s0, w0), wsb(hs1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  cbvrab(s0, hs1, con0, w0, wsb(hs1, s0, w0))
  nfcv(s0, con0)
  nfcv(hs1, con0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, w0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, w0)
  tfi(hs0, crab(s0, con0, w0))
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, con0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs1.w(wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, con0, w0))
}

thm tfis(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ On → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ On →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  simprbi(s0 ∈ On, w0, s0 ∈ On)
  rabeq2i(s0, con0, con0, w0)
  eqcomi(con0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  mp2an({ s0 ∈ On | w0 } = On, { s0 ∈ On | w0 } ⊆ On, ∀(hs0 ∈ On,(hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })))
  ssrab2(s0, con0, w0)
  rgen(hs0, con0, (hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }))
  vtoclgaf(s0, hs0, con0, (hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }), (∀(s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })→(s0 ∈ On ∧ w0)))
  nfim(s0, hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  nfss(s0, hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  nfrab1(s0, con0, w0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }), (s0 ∈ On ∧ w0), hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  syl5bbr(s0 = hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }), hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, s0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  dfss3(s1, s0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  sseq1(s0, hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  syl5bbr(s0 = hs0, (s0 ∈ On ∧ w0), hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  rabid(s0, con0, w0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  anc2li(s0 ∈ On, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }), w0)
  syl5(s0 ∈ On, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0))
  ralimi(s1, s0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0)
  simprbi(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ On)
  elrab2(hs1, s1, { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, con0, [s1 / s0]w0, [hs1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs1, s1, s0, w0)
  cbvrab(s0, hs1, con0, w0, [hs1 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, con0)
  nfcv(hs1, con0)
  nfv(hs1, w0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, w0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs1, w0)
  tfi(hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, con0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs1.w([s1 / s0]w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ On | w0 })
}

thm tfis3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  vtoclga(s0, c0, con0, w0, w1)
  tfis2(s0, s1, w1, w2)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tfis3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ On →(∀(s1 ∈ s0, w2)→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  vtoclga(s0, c0, con0, w0, w1)
  tfis2(s0, s1, w1, w2)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: tfisi
blocks.content: A transfinite induction scheme in "implicit" form where the induction is done on an object derived from the object of interest. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfisi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, con0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wa(wcel(c3, con0), wss(c3, c2)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(c4, c3), w2))), w3)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w3, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w3, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  mpi(w0, w1, wss(c2, c2))
  ssid(c2)
  pm2.43i(w0, wi(wss(c2, c2), w1))
  expd(w0, w0, wss(c2, c2), w1)
  mpi(w0, wi(wa(w0, wss(c2, c2)), w1), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  sylc(w0, wi(wceq(c2, c2), wi(wa(w0, wss(c2, c2)), w1)), wcel(c0, c1), wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, c2), wi(wa(w0, wss(c2, c2)), w3))))
  syl(w0, wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, c2), wi(wa(w0, wss(c2, c2)), w3))), wcel(c2, con0))
  tfis3(hs0, hs1, c2, wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, c2), wi(wa(w0, wss(c2, c2)), w3))), wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2)), w3))), wal(s0, wi(wceq(c4, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w2))))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2)), w3))), wal(s0, wi(wceq(c4, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w2))), wal(s1, wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2)), w3)), wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(c3, cv(hs0)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2)), w3), wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c3)
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2)), w3, wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wss(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs1), c2))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2)
  cbvalvw(s1, s0, wi(wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3)), wi(wceq(c4, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w2)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c3, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3), wceq(c4, cv(hs1)), wi(wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w2))
  eqeq1d(c3, cv(hs1), c4, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c2)), w3, w2)

blocks.name: tfinds
blocks.content: Principle of Transfinite Induction (inference schema), using implicit substitutions. The first four hypotheses establish the substitutions we need. The last three are the basis, the induction step for successors, and the induction step for limit ordinals. Theorem Schema 4 of [Suppes] p. 197. (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

thm tfinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| w2
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(w3, w4))
  -| wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w3), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  tfis3(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1, w3)

  dflim3(s1, cv(s0))

  syldd(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), wral(s1, cv(s0), w3), w1, w4)

thm tfinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On → w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = ∅ →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = suc(s1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ w2
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ On →(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ (Lim(s0)→(∀(s1 ∈ s0, w3)→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  tfis3(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1, w3)
  pm2.61d2(s0 ∈ On, (∀(s1 ∈ s0, w3)→ w1), Lim(s0))

blocks.name: tfindsg
blocks.content: Transfinite Induction (inference schema), using implicit substitutions. The first four hypotheses establish the substitutions we need. The last three are the basis, the induction step for successors, and the induction step for limit ordinals. The basis of this version is an arbitrary ordinal ` B ` instead of zero. Remark in [TakeutiZaring] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-2004.)

thm tfindsg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ c1 ⊆ c0)→ w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = suc(s1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (c1 ∈ On → w2)
  ⊣ (((s1 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ c1 ⊆ s1)→(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ (((Lim(s0)∧ c1 ∈ On)∧ c1 ⊆ s0)→(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  imp31(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, c1 ⊆ c0, w0)
  tfinds(s0, s1, c0, (c1 ∈ On →(c1 ⊆ c0 → w0)), (c1 ∈ On →(c1 ⊆ s0 → w1)), (c1 ∈ On →(c1 ⊆ ∅ → w2)), (c1 ∈ On →(c1 ⊆ s1 → w3)), (c1 ∈ On →(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4)))
  imbi2d(s0 = ∅, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆ s0 → w1), (c1 ⊆ ∅ → w2))

  imp(c1 = ∅, s0 = ∅, (w1 ↔ w2))
  syl6bir(c1 = ∅, s0 = ∅, (w1 ↔ w2), s0 = c1)
  eqeq2(c1, emptycls, s0)
  sylan9bbr(¬ c1 = ∅, s0 = ∅, (c1 ⊆ s0 → w1), (c1 ⊆ ∅ → w2), (c1 ⊆ ∅ → w1))
  imbi1d(s0 = ∅, c1 ⊆ s0, w1, c1 ⊆ ∅)
  sseq2(s0, emptycls, c1)
  pm5.74d(¬ c1 = ∅, c1 ⊆ ∅, w1, w2)

  imbi12d(s0 = s1, c1 ⊆ s0, w1, c1 ⊆ s1, w3)
  sseq2(s0, s1, c1)
  imbi2d(s0 = suc(s1), c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆ s0 → w1), (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4))
  imbi12d(s0 = suc(s1), c1 ⊆ s0, w1, c1 ⊆ suc(s1), w4)
  sseq2(s0, suc(s1), c1)
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆ s0 → w1), (c1 ⊆ c0 → w0))
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, c1 ⊆ s0, w1, c1 ⊆ c0, w0)
  sseq2(s0, c0, c1)
  a1d(c1 ∈ On, c1 ⊆ ∅, w2)
  a2d(s1 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆ s1 → w3), (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4))

  pm2.61d((s1 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), ((c1 ⊆ s1 → w3)→(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4)), (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ c1 = suc(s1)))
  adantl(s1 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, ((c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ c1 = suc(s1))→((c1 ⊆ s1 → w3)→(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4))))
  com4r(c1 ∈ On, (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ c1 = suc(s1)), (c1 ⊆ s1 → w3), c1 ⊆ suc(s1), w4)

  eqvinc(s0, suc(s1), c1)
  sucex(s1)
  vex(s1)
  exlimiv(s0, (s0 = suc(s1)∧ s0 = c1), (c1 ∈ On → w4))
  sylan9r(s0 = suc(s1), s0 = c1, c1 ∈ On, w4, w1)
  syl5ibr(s0 = c1, c1 ∈ On, w1, w2)
  biimpd(s0 = suc(s1), w1, w4)
  syl5bir((s1 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), ¬(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ c1 = suc(s1)), ((c1 ⊆ s1 → w3)→(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ w4)), (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)∧ c1 ≠ suc(s1)))
  bitri((c1 ⊆ suc(s1)∧ c1 ≠ suc(s1)), ¬(c1 ⊆ suc(s1)→ c1 = suc(s1)), (c1 ⊆ suc(s1)∧ ¬ c1 = suc(s1)))
  anbi2i(c1 ⊆ suc(s1), c1 ≠ suc(s1), ¬ c1 = suc(s1))

blocks.name: tfindsg2
blocks.content: Transfinite Induction (inference schema), using implicit substitutions. The first four hypotheses establish the substitutions we need. The last three are the basis, the induction step for successors, and the induction step for limit ordinals. The basis of this version is an arbitrary ordinal ` suc B ` instead of zero. (Unnecessary distinct variable restrictions were removed by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.) (Contributed by NM, 5-Jan-2005.)

thm tfindsg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {

  ex(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wi(w3, w4))

  sylan2br(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(csuc(c1), con0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)), w3)), w1)), wcel(c1, con0))
  sucelon(c1)
  mpbid(wa(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)), w3)), w1)), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3)), w1)))
  adantr(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3)), w1)))

  sylan2(wcel(c1, con0), wlim(cv(s0)), wb(wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3)), w1)), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)), w3)), w1))), wcel(cv(s0), con0))
  mpan(wlim(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(s0), universe))

  sylan2(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wss(csuc(c1), cv(s0))), word(cv(s0)))
  eloni(cv(s0))
  ordelsuc(c1, con0, cv(s0))
  imbi1d(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3)), w1, wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)), w3)))
  ralbidva(s1, cv(s0), wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3), wi(wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)), w3))
  imbi1d(wa(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wcel(c1, cv(s1)), w3, wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1)))
  anassrs(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1))))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, con0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s1)), wss(csuc(c1), cv(s1))), word(cv(s1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), word(cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  onelon(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  eloni(cv(s1))
  ordelsuc(c1, con0, cv(s1))

thm tfindsg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ c0)→ w0)
  ⊣ (s0 = suc(c1)→(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = suc(s1)→(w1 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (c1 ∈ On → w2)
  ⊣ ((s1 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ s1)→(w3 → w4))
  ⊣ ((Lim(s0)∧ c1 ∈ s0)→(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  mp2and((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ c0), w0, suc(c1)∈ On, suc(c1)⊆ c0)
  sylib((c0 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ c0), suc(c1)∈ On, c1 ∈ On)
  onelon(c0, c1)
  imp(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ c0, suc(c1)⊆ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ c0 → suc(c1)⊆ c0), Ord(c0))
  eloni(c0)
  ordsucss(c0, c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ On, c1 ∈ c0, ((suc(c1)∈ On ∧ suc(c1)⊆ c0)→ w0))
  expl(c0 ∈ On, suc(c1)∈ On, suc(c1)⊆ c0, w0)
  tfindsg(s0, s1, c0, suc(c1), w0, w1, w2, w3, w4)
  sylbir(suc(c1)∈ On, w2, c1 ∈ On)
  imp((s1 ∈ On ∧ suc(c1)∈ On), suc(c1)⊆ s1, (w3 → w4))
  sylan2br(s1 ∈ On, suc(c1)∈ On, (suc(c1)⊆ s1 →(w3 → w4)), c1 ∈ On)
  sylbird((s1 ∈ On ∧ c1 ∈ On), suc(c1)⊆ s1, (w3 → w4), c1 ∈ s1)
  ancoms(s1 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ s1 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ s1))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ On, s1 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ s1 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ s1), Ord(s1))
  adantr(s1 ∈ On, c1 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ s1 →(w3 → w4)))
  ex(s1 ∈ On, c1 ∈ s1, (w3 → w4))
  imp((Lim(s0)∧ suc(c1)∈ On), suc(c1)⊆ s0, (∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1))
  sylan2br(Lim(s0), suc(c1)∈ On, (suc(c1)⊆ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1)), c1 ∈ On)
  sucelon(c1)
  mpbid((Lim(s0)∧ c1 ∈ On), (suc(c1)⊆ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1)), (c1 ∈ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1)))
  adantr(Lim(s0), c1 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1)))
  ex(Lim(s0), c1 ∈ s0, (∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1))
  ancoms(Lim(s0), c1 ∈ On, ((c1 ∈ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1))↔(suc(c1)⊆ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1))))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ On, Lim(s0), ((c1 ∈ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1))↔(suc(c1)⊆ s0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1))), s0 ∈ On)
  mpan(Lim(s0), s0 ∈ On, s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  limelon(s0, universe)
  imbi12d((c1 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ On), c1 ∈ s0, (∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3))→ w1), suc(c1)⊆ s0, (∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))→ w1))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ On, s0 ∈ On, (c1 ∈ s0 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ s0), Ord(s0))
  eloni(s0)
  ordelsuc(c1, con0, s0)
  imbi1d((c1 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ On), ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(c1 ∈ s1 → w3)), w1, ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3)))
  ralbidva(s1, s0, (c1 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ On), (c1 ∈ s1 → w3), (suc(c1)⊆ s1 → w3))
  imbi1d(((c1 ∈ On ∧ s0 ∈ On)∧ s1 ∈ s0), c1 ∈ s1, w3, suc(c1)⊆ s1)
  anassrs(c1 ∈ On, s0 ∈ On, s1 ∈ s0, (c1 ∈ s1 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ s1))
  sylan2(c1 ∈ On, (s0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ∈ s0), (c1 ∈ s1 ↔ suc(c1)⊆ s1), Ord(s1))
  syl((s0 ∈ On ∧ s1 ∈ s0), Ord(s1), s1 ∈ On)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, con0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
}

thm tfindes(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ On → w0)
  ⊣ [∅ / s0]w0
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ On →(w0 →[suc(s0)/ s0]w0))
  ⊣ (Lim(s1)→(∀(s0 ∈ s1, w0)→[s1 / s0]w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  tfinds(s1, hs0, s0, w0, [s1 / s0]w0, [∅ / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]w0, [suc(hs0)/ s0]w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, s1, emptycls, w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, s1, suc(hs0), w0)
  sbceq2a(s0, s1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ On →([hs0 / s0]w0 →[suc(hs0)/ s0]w0)), (s0 ∈ On →(w0 →[suc(s0)/ s0]w0)))

blocks.name: tfinds2
blocks.content: Transfinite Induction (inference schema), using implicit substitutions. The first three hypotheses establish the substitutions we need. The last three are the basis and the induction hypotheses (for successor and limit ordinals respectively). Theorem Schema 4 of [Suppes] p. 197. The wff ` ta ` is an auxiliary antecedent to help shorten proofs using this theorem. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfinds2(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(w0, wi(w3, w4)))
  -| wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(w0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w3), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  tfindes(s0, s1, wi(w0, w1))
  mpbir(wsbc(s0, emptycls, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w2))
  sbcie(s0, emptycls, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2))
  0ex()
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), w0, w1, w2)
  3imtr3g(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(w0, w1), wsbc(s0, csuc(cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w4)))
  3imtr3i(wcel(cv(s0), con0), wi(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w4))), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), con0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4))))
  mpbi(wi(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), con0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4)))), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4)))))
  elv(s0, wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4)))))
  sbcth(s1, cv(s0), universe, wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4))))
  a2d(wcel(cv(s1), con0), w0, w3, w4)
  elv(s0, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4)))), wi(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), con0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4))))))
  sbcimg(s1, cv(s0), universe, wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4)))
  sbcel1v(s1, cv(s0), con0)
  elv(s0, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4))), wi(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w4)))))
  sbcimg(s1, cv(s0), universe, wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4))
  sbcie(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w1))
  vex(s0)
  bitr3i(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w4)), wsbc(s0, csuc(cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, csuc(cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))))
  sbcbii(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, csuc(cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w4))
  sbcie(s0, csuc(cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w4))
  sucex(cv(s1))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), w0, w1, w4)
  sbcco2(s0, s1, csuc(cv(s1)), csuc(cv(s0)), wi(w0, w1))
  suceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  syl5bir(wlim(cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wi(w0, w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(w0, w1)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3))))
  bitr3i(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3))), wral(s0, cv(s1), wi(w0, w1)), wsb(s1, s0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3))))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)))
  sbralie(s1, s0, wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w1))

  bicomd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w3, w1)
  3imtr3i(wlim(cv(s1)), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(w0, w1))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wlim(cv(s0))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1))))
  mpbi(wi(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wlim(cv(s0))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1)))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1)))))
  elv(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1)))))
  sbcth(s0, cv(s1), universe, wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1))))
  syl5bi(wlim(cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w3)))
  r19.21v(s1, cv(s0), w0, w3)
  a2d(wlim(cv(s0)), w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w3), w1)
  elv(s1, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wlim(cv(s0))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1))))))
  sbcimg(s0, cv(s1), universe, wlim(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1)))
  sbcie(s0, cv(s1), wlim(cv(s0)), wlim(cv(s1)))
  vex(s1)
  limeq(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  elv(s1, wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3))), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wi(w0, w1)))))
  sbcimg(s0, cv(s1), universe, wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w3)), wi(w0, w1))
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w2)
  diff.con0.s(s1)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w3)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, cv(s1))

blocks.name: tfinds3
blocks.content: Principle of Transfinite Induction (inference schema), using implicit substitutions. The first four hypotheses establish the substitutions we need. The last three are the basis, the induction step for successors, and the induction step for limit ordinals. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2005.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 21-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfinds3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wi(w0, wi(w4, w5)))
  -| wi(wlim(cv(s0)), wi(w0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w4), w2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
} = {
  tfinds(s0, s1, c0, wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(w0, w4), wi(w0, w5))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), csuc(cv(s1))), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(wcel(cv(s1), con0), w0, w4, w5)
  syl5bi(wlim(cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(w0, w4)), wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w4)))
  r19.21v(s1, cv(s0), w0, w4)
  a2d(wlim(cv(s0)), w0, wral(s1, cv(s0), w4), w2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tfinds3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ On →(w0 → w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = ∅ →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w4))
  ⊣ (s0 = suc(s1)→(w2 ↔ w5))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → w3)
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ On →(w0 →(w4 → w5)))
  ⊣ (Lim(s0)→(w0 →(∀(s1 ∈ s0, w4)→ w2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
} = {
  tfinds(s0, s1, c0, (w0 → w1), (w0 → w2), (w0 → w3), (w0 → w4), (w0 → w5))
  imbi2d(s0 = ∅, w0, w2, w3)
  imbi2d(s0 = s1, w0, w2, w4)
  imbi2d(s0 = suc(s1), w0, w2, w5)
  imbi2d(s0 = c0, w0, w2, w1)
  a2d(s1 ∈ On, w0, w4, w5)
  syl5bi(Lim(s0), ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(w0 → w4)), (w0 → w2), (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ s0, w4)))
  r19.21v(s1, s0, w0, w4)
  a2d(Lim(s0), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, w4), w2)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, w4)
  diff.wi.s(s1, w0, w2)
}
